title: Wandering Spirit

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While alive, you cannot perform *any* ability. This includes abilities gained from a third party.
- While dead, you may use your abilities, including ones you gained from a third party.
- While dead, you may speak in both the living and dead chats, and you may vote.
- You can still be targeted while dead, but killing abilities fail, because, um, you're already dead. However, if you are resurrected (for some reason) and killed in the same night, you will remain dead and a death announcement will be made as normal.
- Your role cannot be hidden by any means on your death. Your will can, though it doesn't matter much.
- If no Town members are left alive but the game has not ended, your soul will fade away, and you will actually die. (No voting or speaking in day chats or using abilities.)
- If you run out of uses on all your abilities, the uses on your abilities reset, except for Spirit Split.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Soul Reading** - Learn a player's true role. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value:
- **Tender Watch** - Grant Powerful defense to a player and Purge that player. 2 uses.
- **Supernatural Distraction** - Roleblock a player. 2 uses.
- **Ghastly Haunting** - Deal an Unstoppable attack to a player. 1 use.
- **Spirit Split** (Day) - You will be able to multitask tonight. 1 use.
